channel.title: RscEvo - by Swagger. Clans, classes, ratios, events, arenas
channel.description:
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/9625/swagonoverdrivevb0dt1.png[/img]
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/6822/screenshot4ma5.png[/img]
RscEvo. By Swagger. *Still Beta*. There will NOT be a wipe.
This server lets you choose your class, Skiller, Warrior, Ranger, Mage, Miner ect. (classes are not too relevant YET).
Mostly pking based but items like supers, sharks ect are only obtainable by herblaw, fishing. Clan system with clan chat, clan houses + other goodies.(Premium clan packages can be purchased for barely anything.) Events + minigames. Duel arenas, Pk arenas. Pk messages. Pk points + a pk pt trader. Afk mode K/d ratio Bunch of features from SwagPk.(Afk room, global messages etc.) CTS. CASH GAME.
Much more, all the info you need and more is all on the site, which is in my sig. Definatly a unique server, not ran by amatuers either. Active development and staff.
This server has been up for about a couple weeks but on the low, its in beta stages but close to final release. Remember there will be no wipe when beta is finished.
Most if not all positive feedback thus far. Link in my sig.
Yes, i am the owner of this server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2009, 12:14:19 pm[/size][hr]As we speak: [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/9295/screenshot6kr1.png[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2009, 12:30:55 pm[/size][hr]hit 60.
[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/9610/screenshot0ma6.png[/img]
[img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/4314/screenshot1on0.png[/img]

item.title: RscEvo - by Swagger. Clans, classes, ratios, events, arenas
item.dc:creator: @darkest_mage darkest_mage
item.description:
@darkest_mage wrote:

We are back online now, I took ownership of the server in mid-march, When I got it, tewl had it pinned down like a dead cat… I have now been able to filter the DDoS attacks and we are going strong. Swagger no longer owns this server, however we are still just as actively developing on it as ever before. I noticed somebody said they donated and never received their gift, please contact me in game and I will help you. My In-game name is Chris.

~~Chris

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SERAPH SERAPH
item.description:
@SERAPH wrote:

aww shtty i wana try it out lol; still down

server is back up and its pretty good, a new twist to pk servers. it tells you the name and cb lvl of some one using npcs to tele so you can go get some pkn done. best feature i think by far. every one should try it out.
